name: What a Deluge
description:
Background

I have been hit hard with imposter syndrome recently so I decided to challenge myself to make a small lil game in one day.

Also the day before I decided to make this, my friend showed me another cool game featuring a slime so idk that probably subconsiously affected my decision to make a slime game lmao.

Features
  • Slime game
  • Up to three different colours!
  • Slime game!
  • A chilled out atmosphere
Credits

Art/Design/Code/Writing: Me (Ben Silk) ☂️

Stab SFX: Stabbing Lettuce - Jonathan Shaw 🔪

BGM:  Danse Morialta - Kevin MacLeod ☁️

Final words

If you come across any bugs or just have some feedback please don't hesitate to let me know.

Thank you for playing & I hope you like it as much as I do!
